name: AccuNOC
tag_list: google-apps, hosted-exchange, helpdesk, remote-desktop-support, hosted-dynamic-crm, corporate-gmail
overview: AccuNOC IT is a US based MSP and remote desktop support team providing online PC repair services, home or office desktop support, and web hosting services as well as support for CRM and SaaS applications. With a focus on providing affordable IT Solutions for small and medium businesses, AccuNOC creates customer relationships that embrace affordable technologies. Remote Desktop Support and helpdesk services allow companies the ability to support local and remote users without the burden of maintaining their own IT Department. Hosted Exchange, Dynamic CRM, and Sharepoint services provide small business the opportunity to deploy corporate e-mail without the overwhelming cost constraints of maintaining a complex IT infrastructure. The high costs of deploying and maintaining IT have had a stifling affect on small business growth and expansion. With the ability to customize and coordinate hosted infrastructure, AccuNOC is giving hundreds of small and mdium businesses the ability to realize their full potential. Our latest endeavor has been the adaptation and migration to cloud services, dramatically reducing IT costs even more. With the exponential growth of Google Apps, AccuNOC is now providing deployment services, technical support, and migration services for customers who wish to implement the collaboration utility.
